property.name: url
property.label: iFrame URL
property.description: Specifies the address of the document to embed in the iframe.

property.name: height
property.label: Height
property.description: Specifies the height of the iframe. Default height is 500 pixels.

property.name: width
property.label: Width
property.description: Specifies the width of an iframe. Default width is 100 percent.

property.name: sandbox
property.label: Sandbox
property.description: Enables an extra set of restrictions for the content in an iframe.
